name: BTS
description: BTS is a consultancy specializing in the people side of strategy. For over three decades we’ve been designing powerful experiences that have a profound and lasting impact on businesses and their people. We help the world’s leading companies turn strategy into results.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: Inspiring and equipping people and organizations to do the best work of their lives.

Highlights.name: Strategy execution & business transformation
Highlights.description: A great strategy is worthless if it isn’t well executed. BTS equips and enables your leaders to drive the transformational change needed to bring your strategy to life and deliver incredible results at scale.

Highlights.name: Leader readiness & development
Highlights.description: Today’s leaders must be transformational. BTS has the innovative tools and frameworks needed to help leaders practice and understand how to embrace change, take smart risks, meet employees where they are, and unlock the full potential of their teams.

Highlights.name: Go to market
Highlights.description: Your sales, marketing, product, and service teams face multiple challenges and fragmented markets. BTS can help you connect and engage with your customers, accelerate customer decision-making and drive better business results.

Highlights.name: Talent acquisition & succession
Highlights.description: Real-world experiences drive real-world results.  We believe context matters. Our assessments are about leading your business, not any business, and mirror the dynamics of your business and culture.
